text: Koly neshchastya torkayetʹsya lyudsʹkyy buduchy, vin blahaye nas toy chas, yak lyahayuchy, abo zasidannya, abo vstayuche. Ale yak tilʹky my relieve yoho neshchastya, vin prodovzhuyetʹsya tak, yakby vin nikoly ne blahav nas relieve budʹ-yaki neharazdy! Pratsi porushnykiv takym chynom prykrashayutʹsya u yikhnikh ochakh
